attributes.action: ask all MP's, irrespective of party, to distance themselves from Unite Against Fascists
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details: This is a matter for individual parties and MPs.  If you believe that a criminal act has taken place, you should report this to the relevant police authority.
reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
